dc_description_s: REMOTE DOWNLOAD NOT AVAILABLE - please contact data@library.columbia.edu for access. China County Boundaries with 2000 Population Census Data is a polygon theme representing counties in China in the year 2000.  Attribute information includes population variables from the 2000 census.
dc_title_s: China County Boundaries with 2000 Population Census Data
dct_isPartOf_sm: Historical China County Population Census Data with GIS Maps
